abstract: Less than three months after announcing its initial funding, a mobile social networking start-up Kyte said Monday it had raised $21.1 million in a second investment round led by Steamboat Ventures, which is affiliated with the Walt Disney Company, and Intellect Capital Ventures.
lead_paragraph: Less than three months after announcing its initial funding, a mobile social networking start-up Kyte said Monday it had raised $21.1 million in a second investment round led by Steamboat Ventures, which is affiliated with the Walt Disney Company, and Intellect Capital Ventures.
